attributes.comment:
Adoption is expensive enough as it is. To raise fees by over 50% is just plain
wrong. Clearly, mismanagment abounds if it is necessary to assess those kinds
of increases. Those of us who adopt go through so much to bring our children
home. Why is our own government putting more obstacles in our way instead of
making it easier and more affordable to create loving, American families! I oppose
the increases on these forms and feel that it would be a complete injustice to so
many American families whose savings are already being put to the test simply by
choosing to build their families through adoption.

Comment on FR Doc # E7-01631
attributes.title: Comment Submitted By Amy Friedland
